ActJUDGES ACT (ANNUITIES TO SURVIVORS)
PrecisGranting of a lifelong annuity to DOROTHY NICHOLLS, widow of the Honourable Gordon George Nicholls, a retired Judge of the Superior Court of Justice (Ontario), commencing on June 8, 2008.
